entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:58 a.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
